derivative_factor_dist_control.description: factor to tune the D term of the PID distance controller

derivative_factor_speed_control.description: factor to tune the D term of the PID speed controller

ego_sensor.description: ego sensor component to read from

integral_factor_dist_control.description: factor to tune the I term of the PID distance controller

integral_factor_speed_control.description: factor to tune the I term of the PID speed controller

limit_deceleration.description: how much deceleration is allowed, in [m/s^2]

proportional_factor_dist_control.description: factor to tune the P term of the PID distance controller

proportional_factor_speed_control.description: factor to tune the P term of the PID speed controller

always_full_stop.description: whether to brake to a full-stop on activation

ego_sensor.description: ego sensor component to read from

enabled.description: whether automatic emergency braking is enabled

limit_deceleration.description: how much deceleration is allowed, in [m/s^2]

enabled.description: whether lane keeping assist is enabled

halt_progress_at.description: time in ns at which to halt all progress

components.description: array of components to be extracted

output_file.description: file path to write groundtruth output to

output_type.description: type of output file to write

init_phase.description: time during which initialization is performed

lane_sensor_components.description: array of lane-sensor components to be checked

args.description: defaults to set for binding/name combination
defaults to set for binding/name combination
defaults to set for binding/name combination

ignore.description: JSON pointers to sections that should be ignored

clobber.description: whether to clobber existing files or not

oneOf.comment: path should either not exist or be a file

result.description: file to store simulation result in

oneOf.comment: path should either not exist or be a file
path should either not exist or be a file

path.description: directory to dump output files in, relative to registry path

oneOf.comment: path should either not exist or be a directory

plugin_path.description: list of directories to scan for plugins

polling_interval.description: milliseconds to sleep when polling for next state

oneOf.comment: path should either not exist or be a directory

enable_command_action.description: whether to enable the command action

enable_include_section.description: whether to allow config files to include other files

max_include_depth.description: how many recursive includes are allowed

ignore_source.description: ignore trigger source when reading in triggers

default_timeout.description: default timeout if not overriden, 0 for no timeout

mode.description: modus operandi of watchdog [one of: off, log, abort, kill]

state_timeouts.description: timeout specific to a given state, 0 for no timeout

items.comment: path should exist and be a file

name.description: name of the logger to configure
alternative name plugin is available by

path.description: absolute or relative path to plugin

prefix.description: prefix the plugin name with this

listen_address.description: address web server should listen at

listen_port.description: port web server should listen at

controller_retry_limit.description: times to retry controller processing before aborting

controller_retry_sleep.description: time to sleep before retrying controller process

model_step_width.description: default model time step in ns

namespace.description: namespace for simulation events and actions

vehicles.description: list of vehicle names to make available
list of vehicle names to make available

third_person.description: whether to use third person camera

configuration_rety_attempts.description: attempts to retry connection on broken pipe

dat_file.description: filepath to write VTD data output to

image_generator.description: switch whether VTD should use image generator

label_vehicle.description: how to label vehicle modes in VTD [off,text,human,symbol,unicode]

project.description: indicate which project to find the scenario in (informative)

scenario.description: VTD scenario to use (project must already be loaded)

setup.description: indicate which setup you are using

from.description: VTD sensor to retrieve the component data from

override.description: Override an existing component with the same name

detected_lane_boundaries.description: mock level for detected lane boundaries

detected_moving_objects.description: mock level for detected moving objects

mounting_position.description: mock level for sensor mounting position

protocol.description: VTD module manager sensor connection protocol ( rdb | osi )

vehicles.description: vehicle configuration like sensors and component mapping

at.description: time at which trigger was executed

since.description: time since which trigger was in queue

target.description: data field of the lane boundary the noise should be applied to

reuse_seed.description: whether to get a new seed on reset

seed.description: set random engine seed (effective on reset)

target.description: data field of the object the noise should be applied to

reuse_seed.description: whether to get a new seed on reset

seed.description: set random engine seed (effective on reset)
